title: Judge allows a third offshore wind project to resume construction as the industry challenges Trump
description: A federal judge ruled that Dominion Energy Virginia can resume work on the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project, allowing construction to proceed.
content: A federal judge ruled that Dominion Energy Virginia can resume work on the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project, allowing construction to proceed.
